content.question:
IMAGE 1

Source: Pixabay

IMAGE 2

Source: Library of Congress

The two images each show a different form of beef production. Which of the following statements explains a primary difference between the agricultural practices?

choices.label: Image 2 shows traditional beef production, which has been replaced by the more modern and efficient practices shown in Image 1.
Image 1 shows beef production in developed countries, and Image 2 shows beef production in developing countries.
Image 2 shows beef production in developing countries, and Image 1 shows beef production in developed countries.
Image 1 shows more efficient beef production that results in higher yields able to feed more people compared to the beef production shown in Image 2.
Image 1 shows traditional beef production, which has regained popularity because of perceived environmental and ethical benefits compared to the beef production shown in Image 2.

content.answer: Image 1 shows traditional beef production, which has regained popularity because of perceived environmental and ethical benefits compared to the beef production shown in Image 2.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Compare patterns and trends in sources to draw conclusions.
